subject: Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Michael Bradley transferred from Roma, of Italy’s Serie A, to Toronto F.C., of Major League Soccer — a move that subverted the conventional definition of success for an American soccer player.
snippet: Michael Bradley transferred from Roma, of Italy’s Serie A, to Toronto F.C., of Major League Soccer — a move that subverted the conventional definition of success for an American soccer player.
